application.name: Virtual Machine Manager
application.summary: Graphically manage KVM, Xen, or LXC via libvirt

description.p: Virtual Machine Manager provides a graphical tool for administering virtual machines for KVM, Xen, and LXC. Start, stop, add or remove virtual devices, connect to a graphical or serial console, and see resource usage statistics for existing VMs on local or remote machines. Uses libvirt as the backend management API.
